categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the New Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the New Jedi Order

nodes.text: This male individual was a Force-sensitive member of the Vrassh, a group that was decimated by the Pas'sic. The Pas'sic confiscated significant land holdings from the victims, and, despite ancient Pas'sic customs that dictated they reimburse survivors' families, no compensation was paid. The Vrassh Force-sensitive was greatly angered by this injustice. He was later accepted by the New Jedi Order to be trained as a Jedi, and he became one of the many students of Luke Skywalker, the Master of the Order. The Vrassh student had to work to come to terms with his anger before he could fully embrace his Jedi training, a struggle that, as of 19 ABY, Skywalker was aware of and felt a particular sympathy for.

Timothy Zahn created this individual for his novel Specter of the Past, published by Bantam Spectra in 1997. He was not identified in the novel by name, nor was it made clear whether the Vrassh were a sentient species or a cultural group.
